text:
25 June 1965
Mr. Harold B. Hill
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Harold:
Thanks for your letter of 10 June and the information pertaining
to the "official home" for military members.
I have attached a list of the service schools and Artsy training
centers which may be of help when you undertake your membership drive.
In this respect, Z would recommend you address any correspondence to
the Director of Instruction for specific service schools and to 63 for
the Army training centers.
Sincerely,
Xncl
as
THOMAS J. DOLAN
DCSIT-SCH-EV
